title: Couple With Heart Person Woman Medium Skin Tone Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Person and Man Holding Hands with Heart
description: Depicts a couple, with a person with a light skin tone at the center, connected by a heart. It symbolizes love, romance, and partnership.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of this emoji features two women, one with a medium skin tone and the other with a light skin tone, embracing closely with a heart formed by their hands above them, all rendered with Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. The smooth, rounded edges and subtle gradients on their forms convey a sense of intimacy and shared affection, making it a beautiful representation of love and connection between women on Apple devices. This emoji is perfect for expressing romantic love, deep friendship, or appreciation for a special bond.
